div.p: This article is available at the URI https://dlib.nyu.edu/awdl/isaw/isaw-papers/22-3/ as part of the NYU Library's Ancient World Digital Library in partnership with the Institute for the Study of the Ancient World (ISAW). More information about ISAW Papers is available on the ISAW website.
